title: God Created You
description: God created you to do great things. You can be anything you want to be. I believe in you.‚Äù A father tells his son each time the boy says what he wants to be when he grows up. This is a heartwarming story of a father who encourages the dreams of his son as the boy goes through the stages of childhood. A story of love, patience, encouragement, support and the enduring love of a parent.
author: Kendra Cerroni
